content: tulip bag this pattern remains the property of svetlana rogatykh and is intended for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction or distribution in whole or in part of this pattern or its content is allowed this pattern is available through my etsy shop and ravelry page exclusively if you downloaded this pattern through a website other than two mentioned above then it is an unauthorized and illegal copy please support designers by downloading through their official source thank you 2 recommended materials ● 260 g / 6 skeins / 650m / 715 yds of scheepjes catona fingering 100% mercerised cotton 50 g / 125 m / 136 7 yds in 402 silver green color ● crochet hook 2 5 mm tapestry needle hand-sewing needle yarn color matching sewing thread ● 2 5 cm / 1 2 metal d-rings and 2 metal snap hooks for attaching a strap ● optional you can make a lining measure the bag before purchasing ● zipper if you like measure your finished bag before purchasing ● decovil heavy or any other interlining for the bottom of the bag approximately 4 cm 1 6 by 23 cm 9 measure the bottom of the finished bag before purchasing crochet level intermediate advanced you should know how to crochet following stitches us terminology chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble / triple crochet decrease double_crochet 2 together fpdc front post double_crochet bpdc back post double_crochet crochet hooks 2 5 mm size bag is about 26 cm / 10 ¼ wide and 26 cm / 10 ¼ tall with the gauge mentioned in this pattern the size will vary with the yarn and hook size used gauge fpdc front post double_crochet stitch 24 sts x 20 row = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 exact gauge is not critical in the video i crochet a 2-repeats sample from my written instructions hope it helps you in the second repeat i show in detail the last stitch and join video tutorials are available for rounds 1 to 33 © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 3 abbreviations yo yarn over skip skip the next st space space st sts stitch stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain -chain single_crochet single_crochet blo back loop only half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble triple crochet f fpdc front post double_crochet yo insert hook from front to back and to front again around post of next stitch unless otherwise noted yo and pull up a loop 3 loops on hook then yo and pull through 2 loops twice b bpdc back post double_crochet yo insert hook from back to front and to back again around post of next stitch unless otherwise noted yo and pull up a loop 3 loops on hook then yo and pull through 2 loops twice b around top = b back post double_crochet around top of st yo insert hook from back to front under two loops of indicated st and to back again under two loops
